archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Human Resource Management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.2.4.1] The purpose of the Human Resource Management process is to provide the organization with necessary human resources and to maintain their competencies, consistent with business needs.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 154

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.2.4.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Personalmanagement" ist es, der Organisation das benötigte Personal bereitzustellen und dafür zu sorgen, dass die Fähigkeiten des Personals den Geschäftsbedarfen entsprechen".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.2.4.1] The purpose of the Human Resource Management process is to provide the organization with necessary human resources and to maintain their competencies, consistent with business needs.
